website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to holding heavy handbags, backpacks, or grocery bags, these metal headrest hooks can't be beat. Simple, but strong.
pros: Solid metal construction is tough and durable
Overlapping  loops keep them from falling off
Rubber coated to prevent scratches and noise caused by rattling
cons: Can swing from side to side when not weighted down

customer_reviews.title: Good but better with a little adaptation
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are functional but swing around when not weighed down. My hubby fixed by spreading the hangers to attach to both sides of the headrest for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Finally!! Something that really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a hook to fit on my head rest to attach my handbag to for the longest time. I have sent many back. Some that don't fit and some that fall off while in transit. This one truly works and is universal for all vehicles. No matter the size or length of your headrest poles. You simply squeeze it together it opens and you attach it to your head rest. The hook is not too thin so that it cuts into your purse handles. It is very sturdy and works like a charm. I love it and highly recommend it. Feel free to ask me any questions whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: DezHankins

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these car hooks
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these car hooks! I love how it can be used forward (in the front seat) or backward (towards the backseats). I hang my purse on it when I'm in the car so that when I turn corners, hit the brakes, etc., my purse doesn't fall over spilling the contents of my purse. It's better than sitting my purse in the floor for the same reason. I have a 2018 VW Atlas and they work perfectly in my new vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Diese

customer_reviews.title: Useful but rigid
customer_reviews.text: These attach more easily than some others and need the head rest raised only a little, and the hook really is useful. My objection is that if I have a passenger and need to move the hook around to the back, that's awkward and it sticks out further than I'd like instead of resting down against the seat back. I don't think my car has unusually thick seats, so I suspect this may be an issue for others as well. I may be able to bend the hook down, haven't tried yet, and it's still useful sticking out, just not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: C. G. King

customer_reviews.title: Fishermen Read Here
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at all the outdoor shops to hold my rods safely in our SUV, the only thing is I don't want to spend $40-$100 and have a heck of a time installing. So I tried these and attached them to the rear seats. Holds our 2 piece rods beautifully and safely keeping them off the floor. I don't have a fix for one piece rods but maybe one day I'll think of something. These are sturdy and feel real nice. I do not own a sedan but this could work on the front seats as well. Of course for 2 piece rods.
customer_reviews.author: TrippyLippy

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: They stick out too far - dangerous - can poke someone’s eye out seating in the back seat. 🥺
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: A small accessory that would be welcome addition to any car
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are as expected but after a day of travel and having a bag hanging on one hook has left a dent in the back of the seat where the bars press into the seat. These dents didn't come out overnight and I suspect I will need to work them out eventually, hence the 4 star rating. Hooks are exactly as expected and very strong. I like the rubber coating where attached to headrest, the don't scratch or slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased with this item
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with this item. I especially like that the hook is one piece. I've tried other styles that have two separate pieces forming the hook but everything seems to get hung up on them. Those styles have their usefulness. But this style lets me grab things without using two hands.
customer_reviews.author: Minrox

customer_reviews.title: Love these hooks
customer_reviews.text: Love these hooks!!! I have one on the end of each head rest. As soon as my boys get in the car they take off their coats and hang them on the hooks. It keeps the coats out of the way and off the ground. Best mom car hack! 🙌🏻☺️
customer_reviews.author: Heather nielson

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my car and then bought them for my friends that saw them;and loved them. I bought another more expensive highly advertised brand that broke after a few months. These are still going strong. These were also easily bent (in the vise) to fit my seats exactly. They don’t need to be bent to use them but I am picky so I did. I mainly use them to hang my purse on when I have a passenger in my car or just to make my purse less conspicuous from the outside instead of sitting it on the passenger seat. FYI my purse is large and heavy and the hook holds it well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bryant

customer_reviews.title: length
customer_reviews.text: The hanger is too short and it digs into the car seat upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: senior citizen

customer_reviews.title: Simple design but very useful - i like it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. I had purchased a different type of car headrest hangers (to keep my purse from shooting across the car when I have to stop quickly) and the other type would pop off the headrest. These seem to be a better design since they wrap around the support better. It's a wide hook, so if you're hanging something with a thicker strap, there seems to be less of a chance of it falling off. And another thing I found convenient about this design is that if someone sits in my passenger seat (where the hook is normally facing forward, it's super easy for me to spin it around so it doesn't bother the passenger.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my unconventional use, and I’m sure would be perfect for yours.
customer_reviews.text: I have somewhat an unconventional use for the product. I use it in my pickup as intended to hold a carpeted flood dolly in place against my seat, and in my van for the same purpose but attached to the grating of my divider as opposed to the headrest. In both situations it works perfectly. I tried a couple before that weren’t as sturdy and didn’t hold well. The others were sturdy but the actual hooks were too small to hold the dolly. These by far are perfect. I plan to buy a set for each vehicle on my team, because I simply haven’t found anything better, and the rubberized coating keeps thing from getting scratched or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Hollis

customer_reviews.title: I love these things!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks work great. They are unobtrusive, easy to install, easy to move around as needed. When I have a passenger, I can hang my handbag on the hook behind the passenger seat, where I can still reach it. Leg room is an interesting question; my car is mid-size SUV, and I think there should be plenty of legroom in the back seat, in spite of hanging stuff off the headrests on the front seats. Also, I installed on on the back of a headrest on the rear seats, and I can hang my bag of reusable bags on it...easy to reach and out of the way. I'm really happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thorp

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: These are very handy for keeping my wife's purse off the floor and the seat when she drives. Normally it will fall off the center console or seat while driving making it impossible to get to. With these hooks the purse stays right where she wants it. You can flip these around too if you have passengers in the car and still have access.
customer_reviews.author: James J.

customer_reviews.title: Best car product ever
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever!!! Just bought a new suv and I dont want a bunch of crap on my seats. Bought these for my purse, sons backpack, groceries that I dont want rolling around my truck. Love, love, love these. Will be buying more for others and myself. So very well made, smooth, no rough edges and hold my 7th gr sons backpack. No more groceries rolling around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes the Weight
customer_reviews.text: The second I got these, I ran out to the car and put them in. You do have to lift the head-guard, but shouldn't be a problem in any car or truck. A small child could figure out how. I then proceeded to hang all 2,025 of my reusable shopping bags from them. They fit! There is a lot of room on these and they are sturdy. I'm actually here to order another set, to hang behind the passenger seat for my purses and totes. And, come the holidays, these would make a great stocking-stuffer. My DIL calls my son's car "The Landfill," so perhaps these will help!
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Get you some of these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Use it on Ford F150 crew cab driver headrest. Great to put all those plastic bags on from the store. Just load it up. Thus, helps for the items from spilling out over the bag as you drive. Also, handle to hand a plastic garbage bag for the kids when traveling there, so the side door trash areas don't get gummed up with garbage. I had some plastic ones before and they eventually broke where it attached to the headrest. I think the heat over time just kills the plastic. I prefer these coated metal ones. No notice of them banging around. They stay in place as you drive.
customer_reviews.author: JCT

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Choice Among Many Versions:No Open-Ended "Hooks"
customer_reviews.text: Glad I picked this version after significant research. It's just what I wanted. No frills, easy simple clever design. Installed them instantly to keep my mini-umbrella from falling to the floor in the car. Hung my hat on the 2nd hook, same-- keep it off the floor. The other designs I looked at had open ended hooks. This one because of the closed-end system is NOT going to fall off my headrest posts-- EVER! Great design. I'm thrilled. Will order several more. Quite versatile!
customer_reviews.author: FLowWOOLF NATURALS

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: They don’t fit my car like in the picture. Acura RDX
customer_reviews.author: Heather C. Spurling

customer_reviews.title: VERY WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: These hooks take seconds to install and remove. They are metal so they won't fail. They are coated to protect your upholstery. I got it to hold a 36 oz Yeti thermos with the optional flip lid. This thermos was too big for my cup holders. The Yeti handle on the flip lid fits perfectly over the double hook on one of these hangers. The hanger holds it close to the seat securely, but is easily removed and returned with one hand. Very simple design, but very well made. These hooks will support grocery, bags, purses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: No more purse and bags flying to the floor of my car!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I may have a lead foot! I may also live in a city where people drive badly. So breaking, sometimes hard, happens. I'm sick of my purse, bag - whatever - flying off the seat on to the floor. This handy dandy hook is the bomb. I just hang my cap, sweater, purse, grocery bag on it, and its right there on the back, or front, of the seat as needed. I have one of the hooks turned around when I'm alone in the car so things sit on the seat and hang in easy reach. Sturdy metal and super easy to install. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Allgood

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: Hooks work fine for grocery bags or handbags. They're not very useful for clothes because the clothes touch the floor and result in a wrinkled mess. This is probably related to the height of the seat in our vehicle and not related the product design. So, it keeps grocery bags off the seat and floor so I give it 3 stars for that. The multiple reminders pestering me to leave a review didn't help my overall opinion.
customer_reviews.author: SC Guy

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without these?
customer_reviews.text: These should seriously come with the car! As a dog person, these are wonderful! I can hang so many leashes lol. Really helps keep my car organized. I hook my dog's collapsible water bowl on, too. Aside from dog gear, these are also useful for hanging coats from. I have a great big winter coat and rain coat I hang on these, and the hook is surprisingly strong! Overall, these hooks are absolutely invaluable and I don't know how I'd stay organized without them.
customer_reviews.author: onyxignite

customer_reviews.title: No More Picking Up the ENTIRE Contents of My Purse Off the Floor/Seat!
customer_reviews.text: I use it everytime I’m in the car. I’m horrible about zipping my purse shut. I usually have a water bottle in there that would make that impossible anyways. I was over picking up all the stuff that fell out everytime I turned a corner or hit the brakes. I usually have one facing the front of my passanger seat, but it’s super easy & quick to flip it to the back of the seat if someone gets in. Buy them, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a handicapped van (most rear seats eliminated) and these hooks prevent my grocery and other bags from rolling all over the back wheelchair area. They were easy to install and are not in the way when not in use. I bought two sets and have used all four hooks. I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C. Terry

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a longer commute now and hit the brakes more than I used to. What does that mean? My lunch bag, coat, etc. goes flying off my front seat. SO ANNOYING! I thought I'd get some sort of box or basket I could loop through the seat belt but in my search, these hooks came up and they are PERFECT! I don't have to move a box out of the way and honestly, no passenger has noticed the hooks (though I forget to move them). If you have the same problem I was having, get these! And no, these were not given to me. : )
customer_reviews.author: candicemh

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: perfect addition to the car. Holds a lot of weight. Easy to put on and take off. Makes it convenient to grab things while driving if need be and to hang stuff while traveling so its close by to grab when needed and doesnt get lost in the car somewhere. Allows for more leg room as well. Love em.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Contour Car Hooks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets of these hooks to use in my car to hang my pack with the portable oxygen tank while driving or if I am in the passenger seat. Now I don't have to worry about it rolling around on the floor or go flying off a seat. I don't know why we didn't think of this before, and surprised that the medical company that supplies my tanks did not tell us about the hooks. I plan to also use them for grocery/shopping bags and other items as described in advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: lovereading

customer_reviews.title: Do what they're supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these hooks a short time, so I don't have a backlog of experience with them, but I like how I can hang my purse so another person can sit in the passenger seat. I've had to experiment with the best placement, and so far I find that hanging the hook behind the passenger seat allows me to turn all the way over to grab my purse. I have also tried turning the hook around facing forward for my purse so it doesn't slide to the floor upon sharp stops.I expect to be finding a great deal more use in the fall, when I bring not only my purse, but a bookbag to various meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Lindacirillo

customer_reviews.title: What a mess denier!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one pair to see if I would like them. I've seen others, but this one looked like it wouldn't punch a hole in a sweater. Well. I didn't like them. I LOVE them. No more back seat mess. No more purse flying into the foot well of the passenger seat. I do have a trash bag/Kleenex holder hanging from the headrest on the passenger side also and it doesn't interfere with that. I keep most of them facing the back seat, but one on my passenger seat facing forward for my purse. I can flip both the hook and my trash bag/Kleenex holder to the back if I have a passenger.
customer_reviews.author: Kate A

customer_reviews.title: These hooks stay put.
customer_reviews.text: I have had car hooks before and it was easy to knock them off. I was always searching in the back floorboard for them. Not these! They install securely around the head rest posts and it is easy to install them. Simply pull them apart and slip them around the posts. They snap closed. I still knock the hooks around sometimes but they won’t come off and they are far too sturdy to break. I highly recommend these hooks over the plastic ones I had before which would not stay put. I have given my others away and felt a little bad to hand off inferior hooks. But I am not parting with these.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Makes me less frustrated in the morning!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my car on the way to work. Gone are the days of taking a sharp turn and having my work bag fall over upside down. That is the MOST frustrating way to start your day. I use one in the passenger seat facing forward to hold my purse so I don’t have to open the back door. The only problem is when my husband is driving and I sit in the passenger and forgot to turn it to the back, I will poke myself in the back. But that’s my own fault haha. These things are great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: What a great way to help organize your car.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw these advertised. She has a large SUV and is always transporting kids to school and sports. I ordered two sets for her, which I recommend. These hooks are perfect to hang her big purses on so that the front seat is open for passengers. The kids use them for their bookbags and she says she can hang grocery bags from them as well. So bags are off the floorboards which means they don't get stepped on with big teenage boys cleats, etc. Will be ordering a couple of sets for myself. These hold more weight than some. That is a bonus in itself.
customer_reviews.author: intodogs

customer_reviews.title: It’s Dumb How Smart These Are
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I was not compensated in ANY way for my purchase/review. It’s literally amazing how something so small & mundane could be so helpful. I have a long commute & use these in the front passenger seat of my 2015 Chrysler Town & Country to keep my computer bag/lunch bag upright. The hooks are sturdy, they flip around easily enough when I have a passenger, & can hold plenty. I’ll probably order more for grocery bags in the trunk & for my kids’ junk.
customer_reviews.author: StillerMatthews

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this one
customer_reviews.text: After looking and reading about many of these hooks, I settled on this one. I was very satisfied with these. The price may seem high for two hooks, but to me well worth it. As others of stated, it does stick out from the back seat of my 2018 Honda CRV, but it is not a problem to me. I used the other hook in the front of the passenger seat, and it is very useful. I put my lunch cooler on it as well as my purse, and I no longer have to reach to get them off the floor and their contents when I apply my brakes. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: spazz

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Although the car hooks were sturdy and worth the money, they just didn’t meet my expectations. They don’t lay flat. So, bags and packages hanging on the hooks stick out toward the passenger seats. This was annoying to me. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: PinkLoader

customer_reviews.title: only 2 in package not 4
customer_reviews.text: Took the picture of two and thought I was ordering 2 packs of two. Oh, well. Foreign language problems. They look good enough but I wouldn't have paid $12.99 for two. Maybe for 4. My error, their miss communication.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: I really like this a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a while for a product like this and I am really enjoying having these hooks. They are minimally invasive to the eye and I love that I can flip the hooks around to the front passenger seat when driving alone to secure my purse or bags in the front seat. They are holding up to good weights and haven't left any marks on my seats. Love these and want more to give as gifts for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Really Work Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Work great!!! Quality is excellent, and I like that the part that goes around the headrest posts is covered with rubber so posts won’t get scratched! Have all my cloth shopping bags hanging on one on back of front seat. Use to lay them on front passenger seat & they would all slide off onto the floor. Drove me crazy! Don’t have to worry about that anymore!!! And very easy to install. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: luvmyshihtzus

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THOSE
customer_reviews.text: It is great to not have onions rolling out of the grocery bag underneath the driver's seat only to find weeks later. :-) I gave these out as Christmas stocking stuffers and everyone loved them except for the rarity of these not fitting some SUV seats. I love the fact that I can hang my handbag on this so if I have to stop suddenly, it is not on the floor of the car with everything spilled out of it. Very easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: ladyrs

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for this type of product for a long time. I hate having no secure, easy to reach place to put my purse in the car. This device keeps my purse from sliding all over the car seat and floor while making it easy to grab something from it easily. Love it ! I've bought several to share. I've had several friends ask me where they can get one. Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: Gee whiz

customer_reviews.title: The gadget you didn't know you needed...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Love love these car hooks! We drive curvy, bumpy roads a lot and it is wonderful to be able to put small or medium bags on these hooks without things shifting around and possibly spilling out. I place one hook forward facing and the other backseat facing with my purse and more often in the front seat hook. No more spillage!!! They are very easy to move front or back in seconds. I have placed heavier bags hanging from them as well and they are very sturdy. For reference I have a Lexus SUV and it does not make impressions on my leather.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty Mark

customer_reviews.title: A safety concern
customer_reviews.text: When this was installed on my headrest, it protruded too far away from the seat back. If there was an accident this would be a hazard to anyone sitting in the seat behind it. For this reason, I returned it. Not all cars are the same. it might work on yours. I have a Toyota Rav4.
customer_reviews.author: Caazpa

customer_reviews.title: Helpful little gadget.
customer_reviews.text: Great for groceries you don’t want spilling out of bags or ones you don’t want to get crushed, and great for having your purse at easy access when you can’t have it by you on the front seat. I’m just not fond of how easy it turns around when there is nothing hanging from it (if you’re one that keeps the headrest up) - makes it a tad frustrating when you want to hang something right away. Not a huge issue though.
customer_reviews.author: Raven.RaeN

customer_reviews.title: Tablet Holder!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a remedy to hold my kids tablets that have the bulky foam stand / carrying case, these work perfectly. Other hooks I purchased could not fit through the tablet handle. Note: I'm 5'5 and my almost 4yr old who sits behind the driver's seat can not reach his tablet while in his car seat. He may be able to if I was taller and seat pushed back more Regardless; it keeps them off the floor and is great for travel
customer_reviews.author: Soda Star

customer_reviews.title: Stop the Avalanche!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are the best idea ever! I'm always having to pick up my purse or my small shopping from the floor of the passenger side of the car. They fly there if I break, or turn, or just generally drive in traffic. Place the handle of your tote or grocery bag over the hooks and voila! The stuff you put on the seat stays on the seat. I use mine in the front of the car, but these hooks would be equally useful hanging into the back seat. The hooks themselves are sturdy and good looking. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TWS

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: These car hooks are solid! I have used them many times and they hold up. They are a good length and the hook is more than adequate to hold a variance of things. I had plastic one's that failed horribly and the hook was so small stuff fell off. But I have had these 4 months now and they are proving their worth. I am going to get another pair for driver side as well.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Handiest Car hooks ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! Use them to hang my purse, grocery bags, snacks, travel blankets, and all kinds of stuff! I loved them so much, I immediately ordered more to put in my husband's vehicle as well as his parents van too. They are so easy to attach and strong too. Plus, they are unobtrusive. Right now, I just have one on each side in my husband's vehicle; however, in mine I have two on each side (one on each headrest post). Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: GolferTJ

customer_reviews.title: Fits larger headrest posts
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a pair of hooks previously, but they were too small to fit on the thicker headrest posts in my van. So I tried these, they fit wonderfully and they are SO handy. No more purse falling in the floor when I drive. But if you have a passenger, they easily slide around to the backside of the seat. Sturdy hooks that I have already used, used, used! What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: LFarrand

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt do the job
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and sturdy, but the hook doesn't come low enough to get my purse strap or bag straps b/c I don't want them to "hang" - I would rather they sit on the sit with the strap over the hook. Because of that I have not been able to use it and now they're just garbage. Oh well. It was a good idea. If you don't mind things hanging, then they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: L. Talan

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time I purchase these hooks. I had them in my car and my husband sort of expropriated them. LOL So, I had to buy more. They fit well and they don't look cheap. I have been using them to hand my purse, groceries, you name it. My husband will hand a headset while he is driving and all kinds of other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: vtx_chic

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have one hooked onto the passenger seat in my car to hold my purse. Now it doesn’t go flying to the floor every time I stop suddenly. It doesn’t slide around on my seat when I go around a curve. These little hooks are life savers!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie MK

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to hang my purse, workout bag, etc. I had plastic hooks in my old car and they broke in a month. I have nothing but good things to say about the 'High Road' Car Hooks. I bought two sets so I have two hooks on the passenger side and two on the driver seat. I flip them around so I can hang my purse on the front of the passenger seat but can easily turn them towards the back seat when I have a passenger. They are simple to use and strong ... they hold my purse :). I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional & They Don't Fly Off.
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this style is... because it completely attaches, they don't fly off the rear seats when I fold them down flat to make room in the cargo area of my SUV. Later, when I lift the seats back up again, these are still attached so a definite plus for seats that fold down. And because these are so strong and sturdy, I am actually finding different uses for them around the house and the garage. Lost one star for lack of color options since my upholstery is tan otherwise I do like these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: So far I love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, where were these all my life?! I love them. After I figured out how to install, I put one on the passenger seat facing front and one on the drivers seat facing backwards for when I'm driving my Mom around and put both are handbags in the back of my 2006 Hyundai Tuscan. Now no worries when people stop short or turn w/o notice or not using their directionals (my biggest pet peeve ever!!!!!) and my bag goes falls over or flies onto the floor. YAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: 80sRockerChick

customer_reviews.title: This is way more handy than I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, and I find I'm using it all the time -- for purse, groceries, facemask, workout bag, I love it. I have it facing forward on the pax seat when no one's with me most of the time, but super easy to spin it to the back when you have someone with you. I wish I'd known about these years ago. Very happy with my purchase, and my friends who have seen it are convinced too.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Eminently practical!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hooks. They easily flip from front facing and allow me to secure my purse on the front seat. Or flip them rear facing and hook your shopping bags, umbrella and all sorts of other items. It keeps your purse from sliding or tipping over and spilling contents, same for drugstore or small grocery bags. I have now placed 2 in my vehicle and 1 in my spouse's truck so I have a place for my purse when I'm in the passenger seat. And with my purse off the floorboard, keeping the bottom of my bags nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: indispensable
customer_reviews.text: I use one on passenger seat to hold my purse strap. No more flying purse and dumped contents while driving. I use this every day. Another hangs behind driver's seat for plastic bag handles. The bags hold items flat in the bottom. If you put bags on the car seat, the bags are tiled and can spill and slide. The hooks can also go in rear luggage area of SUVs to hold bags in place and upright. They are strong and do not damage the car upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: PageTurner

customer_reviews.title: Best car hooks ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several different types of car hooks before I found these. The fact that I had to buy more should tell you that the previous purchases were not good but these are so good, I bought them for both of our cars and for both front seats. They hold my purse, grocery bags, gym bag, etc. They really are the best car hooks in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this product while riding with a friend. I ordered a set and was so pleased that I ordered a set for a gift. I love that it easily can turn from front to back. I like that it is metal and not plastic. In all, I have ordered 4 sets.
customer_reviews.author: Smarie

customer_reviews.title: Love these- PLUS- I used one for another purpose!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hooks using them as intended. I live where there are alot of wildlife that run out on to the road and one needs to stop quickly. My work bag never falls over and spills evertying because I have it on the hook. It's GREAT. Plus... I had surgery on my hands and it was difficult, if not impossible some days, to grab my seat belt to put on. I used one of these hooks to secure the seatbelt and bring it around so that I could put it on. It was a lifesaver... literally. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! These come in a box of two. Saw all the good reviews and decided to order another to get a head start on Christmas. Glad I did - goes on in 2 seconds can manipulate it to either face front or back of head rest. Great to not have to hunt behind seat on the floor for my purse if I have a passenger and not in the way if I purse on top of compartment between the two front seats. Also no tipping over on the floor if have to stop suddenly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay put where put
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd set of hooks I bought. The first set was plastic and too tight around my purse straps. Hard to get purse out. Threw in trash. Second set too flimsy, but metal. Kept falling on floor of car since it wouldn’t stay hooked around headrest with weight on it. Threw in trash. Then I got this set. Love them!! Sturdy and durable. Stay attached to headrest with weight of my purse. Winner!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had these years ago. A few years back I had a warranty issue on my car, the seat belt sensor on the passenger side went bad. The technician told me to never put anything on the passenger seat while driving because the sensor is constantly working trying to figure out if a seatbelt is required. As a result, I have put my purse on the back seat or floor of my car. Both locations Suck for obvious reasons. These hooks are fantastic! They take seconds to install, keep my purse off the seat and easy to reach. I cannot rave enough about these. My grown daughters will be receiving these in Christmas stockings for sure!
customer_reviews.author: CKD

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was the BEST purchase I have made. I have one behind the babies car seat for his bag and one on my passengers side for my bag. Love having everything in its place! I will Definitely be getting more for the back for groceries and the other locations for trash and lunch boxes! Sturdy and Highly Functional! Easy to flip around so multi functional!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wilson Hassold Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Handiest things I own.
customer_reviews.text: How did I live without these? I had never thought about how much easier life would be without having to retrieve the contents of my purse, scattered groceries, books, etc from the floor of my car. I searched many brands before I chose these. They are super easy to install (hanging front or back), strong, well designed, and work like a charm. The price is more than reasonable too. What’s not to love? The handiest things I own, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I got these Hooks to end the constant tangling of my purse handles behind the seat. The hook is stronger than expected. I kept one in my car and one is in our truck. My husband used it as much for his bags as I do. Most likely I will get another pair. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy  Goobie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Purse In Place
customer_reviews.text: I think I first saw these in a facebook ad and I am so glad that I bought a couple of sets. I have one set facing forward on the passenger seat which allows me to place my purse on it and have it not slide around my vehicle. My second set is on the back of my seat and it allows for small bags from stores or items my kid my night to be stored with ease. I’d highly recommend giving them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and hang your hat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to hang a ball cap on. They work great. I was a little disappointed they do not hang flat against the seat back. They stick out at an akward angle. They are so sturdy and strong, they can't be bent down any flatter. No one rides in the back seat so not an issue for us, but it may bother some people.
customer_reviews.author: Deeno

customer_reviews.title: keeps the bag/purse upright
customer_reviews.text: For a woman with a purse that spilled everything onto the floor in the car when making a turn or short stop, this is a God send! Works for bags with handles and totes and purses with handle/strap. I highly recommend them. I have mine toward the front in the passenger seat, but it turns easily to the back seat when you have a passenger. And very handy for back seat too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You never knew you needed this
customer_reviews.text: I got a 2 pack of these hooks to keep my purse from sliding around on my leather car seats. I didn’t think I would get any use out of the second hook but I started hanging grocery bags on it to keep the delicate items from getting smashed in the trunk. I’ll hang the shopping bag with bread or eggs on there so that it won’t get squished by a grocery bag full of canned goods or a jug of laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Miss See

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hold my purse or medium to light weight grocery items and they are so sturdy. I believe these will keep for a very long time. I try not to put heavy items on it, although I have and the hooks held it well, but I don't know what affect it is having on my headrest, so I try to keep everything light to medium. These are worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dibolacj

customer_reviews.title: Fit my Audi's square head rest posts
customer_reviews.text: Only ones that fit ...the rest are designed for round posts. These are very strong and hold many grocery bags. What I like most is that they swivel so that passengers in the back can easily push them out of their way or I can turn it sideways for easier access to my purse. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great and so useful
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I love that they don’t come off. I used to have a different kind of hook thingy for my passenger seat for my purse and whenever I had to adjust it at all it would fly off. This is very discreet and super sturdy. There’s literally nothing bad about this design that I can find.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer

customer_reviews.title: The greatest gadget I never knew I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I almost purchased a much cheaper hook. After reading reviews about some hook rattling or being flimsy I went with these. These have a rubber coating so they don’t rattle and I like the way they open to go around the bar of the headrests. I love that I can use them on the front of the passenger seat when Im by myself and can swing it to the back of someone needs to sit there. I will likely be buying more for the back seats. I use it to hang out bags, backpacks, plastic bags for cars trash etc.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gresser

customer_reviews.title: Love these hooks
customer_reviews.text: I love these hooks. I ordered 2 sets. Prior to them my groceries would go all over the back seat of my suv. Not anymore since I got these. U can also flip one hook around to face forward so u can hang your purse another thing that would fall off the seat and onto the floor everything would fall out, so frustrating. I highly recommend these and I have to friends and family. They can be used in any vehicle not only suv’s.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Easy, So Convenient, Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I like these hooks a lot. They are easy to install, and really convenient. When I have no passengers, I swing one of them around to the front seat to use. With a front seat passenger, I swing it around to the back. Now i always have a safe place to hang my purse or bag, and don’t have to worry about it falling over and losing the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee Megadoodoo

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A WONDERFUL IDEA!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a problem with "turn the corner and lose the contents of your purse when you're in the car" -ITIS...these hooks sure did the trick! I did my research and found that these will fit any diameter headrest post and the hook is large enough so that I can actually put my purse AND my lunch bag on one hook...I'm "gifting" the other hook to my best friend!! SO glad I got this hook...it's amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I never knew I needed this now can't live without it.
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with these hooks for my morning commute and beyond. I hang my purse, my lunch bag, and anything else I don't want to worry about rolling around. I can reach my purse to grab my lip balm or anything I need without fumbling around or taking my eyes off the road. When someone gets in the front seat, I just flip it to the back seat and hang my purse behind my seat instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michele My Bel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hanging masks from
customer_reviews.text: Pre-pandemic, I hung my purse and grocery bags from these hooks. Now, I've found that they're perfect for hanging my masks! It keeps them clean and out of the way. On those rare occasions that I drive my husband somewhere, I just flip the hooks around to hang from the back of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: CAWoman

customer_reviews.title: Smart idea
customer_reviews.text: When I decided I needed hooks I researched like crazy. Almost bought a different type but because of reviews and mostly ease of installation I bought these. Loved them so much I bought 2 more packs! In our suv I have a set on the back head rests to hang grocery bags in the back area. No more groceries rolling around the floor! And I can always find my purse. When a passenger gets in my car I just flip the hook with purse from front to back. So easy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love these handy hooks!!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy! I broke my right wrist and got the cast off recently and now if my purse is on passenger seat when I’m driving, it doesn’t dump all over if I stop suddenly or go around corners!! 😀 it’s at a perfect height where I can see in my bag, but it’s safely hanging on the sturdy hook! 👍🏼 I use the 2nd one on the back for my work tote bag! And I love that I didn’t have to take the headrests off to install it! 🎉😃
customer_reviews.author: Joan C.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I was given one of these as a gift from a friend. Then I bought more on Amazon. Now all my friends and family want them. They're great!! No more purse and workbag flying across the front seat and dumping. No more groceries rolling around in the back seat. These are very heavy duty and incredibly handy.
customer_reviews.author: Customer HLJ

customer_reviews.title: You've got to get these
customer_reviews.text: I had bought some cheapo car hooks at Walmart and thought, they'll be fine. I should have bought these in the first place. I can pile a ton of stuff on them because it is a good size hook, not a baby hook. And they're sturdy because they're not plastic. A lot of the time I have my purse, my lunch bag, and one or two other bags from stops that I've made before I get home, all on the hook.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of hooks
customer_reviews.text: I took another poster's suggestion, spread one of the hooks and attached it across both the headrest pillars. It looks nice and feels more sturdy this way. It's substantial but easy to manipulate into shape. I want to use this with some thin hangers to hang some shirts up so they don't get too wrinkled up.
customer_reviews.author: Mel S.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t have too many!
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying these! One in the front passenger for my purse & one behind each front headrest for my kids’ mini backpacks I keep loaded with paper & markers. Helps keep junk off the floor of my car! Oh & one in my trunk attached to a head rest for a bag that holds all my returns.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! My car is so much neater and cleaner, and I have easy access to my bags and sweatshirt. I can turn them around and use on the seat or keep them facing the back and use them for my shopping bags. Stops things from rolling around and keeps my seats clear!
customer_reviews.author: Clindsay1213

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Design
customer_reviews.text: These hanging storage hooks are great! They are well designed and made, keep clutter in the car to a minimum (even when we've got the whole family in the car!), are unobtrusive to other usable space in the car, and keep my items from touching the floor of the vehicle. The hooks are covered with silicone on the parts which attach to the headrests, so they don't jiggle around or make any rattling noise as you drive. Super simple, super effective. I'd definitely purchase again, or even recommend to my (equally neurotic) friends!
customer_reviews.author: EPRivera

customer_reviews.title: Perfection !
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I had others I used but every time I made a turn (not even sharp) my items fell off. These are very securely attached to the seat Head rest and hang a little lower and have a good size "hook" that will hold my handbag handle(a) or shopping bags. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect on the front passenger seat to keep my purse in place
customer_reviews.text: My purse was always falling off the seat, sending everything inside spilling everywhere. It doesn't get in the way. My husband, grandson and others hop in the car with the hook still in place and they don't even notice. If I have a passenger in the front seat, I can just flip it around to the back of the seat and place my purse there. I own 2 of them and we use them both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ruined the leather in my car.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product very excited with its sleek design and easy installment. However, it says it will not leave marks on your leather, and that is only true for a few select vehicles. I drive an accord and it presses directly on the leather and leaves indentation marks on the back of both the driver and passenger chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I commute A LOT in heavy traffic...inevitably, traffic will be free flowing, and then all of a sudden come to a grinding halt - purse (and everything in it) dumping to the floor....so annoying. These hooks hold a lot of weight, and keep things from going everywhere. Bought two sets - one facing forward, one facing backward. LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia C Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Useful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are super handy. I flip them over to the front to hang my purse and now no more spills! The wide and deep hook is not damaging to my purse strap. I can flip the over to the back and still hang my purse, or bags, or whatever. They were also easy to put on and nice that the design means they won’t fall off. I had purchased a different hook and they simply fall off and the hook is tiny. I moved them for plastic bags only.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schutte

customer_reviews.title: These hooks are great!
customer_reviews.text: I like these hooks so much I've given them for gifts. Very sturdy and I like the way they hook around the headrest. As you can see from the product picture, they can't come off or fall off. You can swing them around from back to front if necessary. But they only come off when you take them off. My favorite car gadget!
customer_reviews.author: kennedydogs

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found these
customer_reviews.text: I was really tired of chasing the contents of my bags around the back seat of my car. These have solved that problem completely. I use one hook for my tote (that isn't light) and the other for lunch bags or whatever else I happen to be hauling around. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meagen

customer_reviews.title: Do the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks work so well! I had previously bought different ones off Amazon and had to return them because they didn't contour to the seat and hid most of the hook from being used. These contour to the seat and are big enough to hang things on them. I love that you can easily flip them from the front seat to back seat. I mainly use them for my purse on the front seat. I love that it comes with 2, I put one in each of our cars. They are sturdy and very good quality. These work extremely well and I highly reccomend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deep Hooks = Best Hooks
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased plastic headrest hooks that looked slick and were cheap, but the "hook" part was so shallow that I could only old one -- maybe two -- bags on them. These wire hooks are deep and allow me to hang a lot more bags, for shopping or for trash, and they're super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Svalexplorer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CAR HOOKS EVER
customer_reviews.text: I've tried and returned many others. These are super easy to install, really strong and sturdy, great size hooks that actually hold heavy bags, and easy to switch from front seat hooks to back seat hooks. Will fit any size poles for front seat headrests. THE BEST
customer_reviews.author: Aine Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love these little gizmos!
customer_reviews.text: My purse, lunch bag and grocery bags were always falling over and spilling things on the floor when I turned corners while driving and these gizmos were the perfect answer. No more items falling all over the floor to pickup! When someone needs to sit in the passenger seat, I simply swing the hook around to face the back. No problem. Very pleased with this these!
customer_reviews.author: C Will

product_meta.title: High Road Contour CarHooks Car Headrest Hangers (2-Pack, Black)
feature_bullets: ADD SPACE-SAVING STORAGE TO THE SEAT BACK - patented black matte car hangers convert headrest posts into added storage space in the front seat, back seat and cargo area
KEEP GROCERY AND HANDBAGS FROM TIPPING - no more loose items rolling around on the floor or taking up seat space, our Contour car headrest hooks make driving more organized while improving safety
EASY TO ATTACH AND SIMPLE TO USE - simply open the cushioned loops at the back of the car hook and wrap around any metal headrest post
HOLDS EXTRA WEIGHT WITH NO HOOKS OR SNAGS - each car seat hanger holds up to 40 lbs., and the closed-loop design won't snag handles or clothing
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION, QUALITY MATERIALS - solid metal with powder coated, black matte finish, rubberized ends to prevent noisy clatter while protecting headrest posts, Patented

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,964 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
